title: 1031 exchange documentation
dataVerified: Exchanger name, relinquished/replacement properties, intermediary, tax deferral amounts
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Shows the issuer domain and the responder text (e.g., "Valid ID" or "Denied").
rationale: Prevents fraudulent 1031 exchanges. Domain binding verifies qualified intermediary. IRS audit trail. Tax compliance. High-value transactions ($500K+ typical).
